about.name: Eva Famechon
about.bio:
I'm Eva, a frontend web developer passionate about creating visually stunning and user-friendly web experiences. 

After an 8-month training at OpenClassrooms, I transitioned from marketing to explore web development. 

My love for all forms of art fuels my creativity and attention to detail.

skills.title: Front-end Web Development
skills.description: I specialize in front-end development, creating interactive and user-friendly user interfaces.

skills.title: Back-end Web Development
skills.description: I have a strong understanding of back-end technologies and use Node.js, RESTful APIs, and authentication mechanisms to develop robust and scalable web applications.

skills.title: Design & UX/UI
skills.description: Passionate about creating and designing user experiences, I bring an artistic touch by crafting intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.

projects.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
projects.subtitle: Backend development for a book rating website
projects.shortDescription: Development of the backend for a book rating website for a local bookstore chain
projects.detailedDescription:
This project was completed as part of my training at OpenClassrooms as an educational project aimed at developing my backend development skills with Node.js and Express.js.

Mon Vieux Grimoire is a web application that allows members to add and rate books. I was responsible for creating and developing the backend of this site. My role involved setting up the RESTful API that handles book-related operations, user authentication, and review management. The backend offers various features such as creating, reading, updating, and deleting (CRUD) books, user management, and review validation.

I used Node.js and Express.js for server-side development, along with MongoDB as the database using Mongoose. I also implemented user authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to ensure data security. The project followed best practices for data security, unique email validation, and the implementation of middlewares for request management.
projects.githubLinkTitle: Click to access the project Github repository
competencies: Implementation of a logical data model in compliance with regulations
Secure storage of data
Secure implementation of CRUD operations

projects.title: Kasa - Booking Web Application
projects.subtitle: Front-end development with React for a booking platform
projects.shortDescription: Development of the web platform for accomodation booking for the company Kasa
projects.detailedDescription:
This project was completed as part of my training at OpenClassrooms as an educational project aimed at developing my frontend development skills with React.

 I developed the front-end of the web application for accomodation booking for Kasa using React technology. My role involved creating and developing React components, setting up routes with React Router, and following the provided mockups. The project followed Kasa's coding guidelines to ensure code quality.
projects.githubLinkTitle: Click to access the project Github repository
competencies: Configuring navigation between application pages with React Router
Using React to create interactive components

projects.title: Improve Care Campaign
projects.subtitle: Design work for the 'Improve Care' marketing campaign
projects.shortDescription: Design work for the "Improve Care" marketing campaign
projects.detailedDescription:
As part of the global marketing campaign "Reduce hospitalization. Improve care.", I contributed to the promotion of our portfolio of implantable medical devices. My role involved graphic design work, creating infographics and icons to raise awareness of our clinical results.

For this campaign, I designed an infographic that showcases the clinical outcomes of our implantable cardiac devices. These posters effectively communicate a wealth of information in a visually engaging manner. By incorporating graphs and icons, I ensured key messages are easily understood. Furthermore, we provided a link to our marketing website where customers can access detailed clinical papers for further information.
competencies: Created infographics to highlight clinical results.
Executed graphic design work for the "Improve Care" campaign

projects.title: Art Workshop Facilitator
projects.subtitle: Volunteering to promote art among individuals in need
projects.shortDescription: Volunteer art workshop facilitator to promote art among individuals in need
projects.detailedDescription:
As a volunteer at Art Explora, I participated in a unique experience of co-creating artworks with other participants throughout the month of October 2022. During this period, I acted as both a facilitator and a creator, fostering connections between associations, schools, and artists from around the world.

 During the pre-opening weekend of Hangar Y in Meudon, France, which attracted over 10,000 visitors, I had the opportunity to share my experience with the public, explaining and discussing about the workshops. It was a fantastic opportunity to engage with the community and promote access to art and culture for all.
competencies: Facilitated art workshops
Promoted art and culture
Created connections
Social engagement

projects.title: Debugging and Optimization of a Photographer's Website
projects.subtitle: SEO optimization and debugging
projects.shortDescription: Optimization and debugging of a professional photographer's website
projects.detailedDescription:
This project was completed as part of my training at OpenClassrooms as an educational project aimed at developing my skills in SEO. 

 In this project, I optimized the website of a professional photographer by improving its performance and search engine optimization. I analyzed the site, reduced loading time, and fixed accessibility errors. I optimized the images without compromising their quality, improved the code, and added meta tags and Schema.org for local search engine optimization. 

 I resolved specific issues such as faulty navigation in the gallery and incorrect filter display. I used Chrome DevTools to debug the site and prepared a detailed intervention report with performance metrics before and after optimization.
projects.githubLinkTitle: Click to access the project Github repository
projects.websiteLinkTitle: Click to access the project website
competencies: Optimizing website performance
Debugging a website using Chrome DevTools
Improving local SEO for better visibility
Writing an intervention report to test a website

projects.title: Painting & Drawing
projects.subtitle: My paintings and drawings projects
projects.shortDescription: Selection of paintings and drawings capturing my perception of the world
projects.detailedDescription:
During the first COVID-19 lockdown in 2020, I rediscovered the joys of painting and drawing, and I haven't stopped since. My creativity allows me to explore the beauty of the world and bring my personal vision to life.

You can find a selection of my creations, including an oil pastel drawing, a ceramic painting, and some paintings that capture the beauty of nature. I have also included pencil sketches of iconic Parisian buildings such as the Saint-Sulpice church and the Cortot concert hall. And for a bit of fun, don't miss my cute drawing of chatty pumpkins.
competencies: Created sketches of iconic Parisian buildings
Practiced painting and drawing
Used digital tools like Adobe Photoshop and Procreate to create digital artworks

projects.title: Sophie Bluel's Portfolio Website
projects.subtitle: Create a dynamic portfolio website using JavaScript
projects.shortDescription: Creation of a dynamic website using JavaScript and DOM manipulation
projects.detailedDescription:
This project was completed as part of my training at OpenClassrooms as an educational project aimed at developing my front-end development skills with JavaScript.

I created the portfolio website for an architect. The project involved building different sections of the website, including the homepage, the admin login page, and a modal for media downloads.

I manipulated the DOM with JavaScript to create dynamic and interactive elements, retrieved user data from forms, and handled user events. I followed the provided design from Figma and integrated backend code to store and manage data.
projects.githubLinkTitle: Click to access the project Github repository
competencies: Manipulated DOM elements with JavaScript
Retrieved user data in JavaScript via forms
Handled user events with JavaScript

projects.title: Transform a design into a website with HTML & CSS
projects.subtitle: Create a website by integrating a design using HTML and CSS
projects.shortDescription: Development of the Booki website interface that allows users to find accommodations and activities in the city of their choice.
projects.detailedDescription:
This project was completed as part of my training at OpenClassrooms as an educational project aimed at developing my front-end development skills with HTML and CSS.

I integrated the website's interface based on the provided mockups and images. I ensured that the website is responsive and follows the provided breakpoints for different devices.

Throughout the project, I followed coding best practices, used semantic HTML tags, and validated the code with W3C's HTML and CSS validators. The website is compatible with the latest versions of Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox.
projects.githubLinkTitle: Click to access the project Github repository
projects.websiteLinkTitle: Click to access the project website
competencies: Integrating content according to a mockup
Implementing a responsive interface

projects.title: Planning of Menu Maker by Qwenta Project
projects.subtitle: Project management, technical specifications, and technological watch
projects.shortDescription: Planning the development of a menu website for Qwenta
projects.detailedDescription:
This project was completed as part of my training at OpenClassrooms as an educational project aimed at developing my project management skills.

In this project, I conducted technological research to generate ideas and define the technical specifications for the MenuMaker website by Qwenta. Employing the agile approach, I managed the planning through iterative sprints, organizing tasks using the Jira project management tool, and tracking the project's progress with a Kanban board.

I also presented all these documents, including the technical specifications, planning, and the communication plan with Qwenta.
competencies: Utilizing a project management tool
Writing technical specifications based on functional requirements
Breaking down features into tasks to prepare for development
